Articles.Content:
Hi everyone, I just bought this game last night, and messed with the tutorial a little, but I am hooked! I am looking forward to leaning how to build a space program and meeting new folks along the way. 

Dizz

Greetings! Tutorials are pretty useful, so are many of the walk-throughs and movies available in the Tutorial Forum.

Expect a lot more material to come out soon (from me and others) on how to Rocket Science! =)
a LOT of information on this forum too, can spend hours reading here ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Hullo hullo! Indeed, what MisterPG said. The Forum is a fantastic source for fun and information.
Greetings and welcome to one of the finest communities on the web!
